Description: MainActivityhas a FetchContentTask class that performs web connection by using the HttpURLConnection API. The connection is automatically started when the MainActivity is created.
MainActivityhas a FetchContentTask class that performs web connection by using the HttpsURLConnection API. The connection is started when the button is clicked.
MainActivitycalls another Activity, RetrofitCallActivity. RetrofitCallActivityperforms web connection by using the Retrofit API when it is created.

MainActivitycalls another Activity, VolleyCallActivity. When VolleyCallActivityis created, VolleyCallActivitycalls VolleyHelper's function (in a separate file) to open a web connection using Volley API.
MainActivitycalls another Activity, DefaultHttpClientCallingActivity. DefaultHttpClientCallingActivityperforms web connection using DefaultHttpClient API when it is created.
MainActivitycalls another Activity, ConnectionActivity is in another package. ConnectionActivity performs a web connection using OkHttpClient API when it is created.
MainActivitystores input data to the SharedPreference and loads back the data into the text view.
MainActivitystores input data to the SQLiteDatabase and loads back the data into the text view using the DatabaseHelper class.
MainActivitystores data to the Realm and loads back the data into the text view in the DisplayActivity using Realm API. The RealmConfiguration is in the MyApplication file.
MainActivitystores input data to the InternalStorage and loads back the data into the text view. A CacheStoringActivity stores input data to the InternalStorage with CacheDir API.
MainActivitystores input data to the ExternalStorage and load back the data into the text view.
MainActivity uses KeyStoreHelper , which uses KeyStore API, to load the key for encryption and decryption.
MainActivity establishes a connection using Bluetooth API.
MainActivity establishes a connection using NFC API.
MainActivity establishes a connection using Socket API.
MainActivity establishes a connection using SSLSocket API.
MainActivitysend a message to a recipient by using SmsManager. The SmsReceiver receives the SMS by using SmsMessage.
MainActivityopens a Camera and take a picture
MainActivityaccesses the user’s Contacts
MainActivityaccesses the user’s Calendar
MainActivityaccesses the user’s Location and displays the latitude and longitude
MainActivityaccesses the user’s BodySensors and displays the accelerometer data (X, Y, and Z axes)
MainActivityuses the MediaRecorder API to record audio from the device's microphone.
MainActivity is exported by default. ExportedFlagActivity is exported because of the exported flag is true. IntentFilterActivity is exported because of having the intent-filter.
